# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

# Project name
project(Socket<< Project.Name >>)

# This setting is useful for providing JSON file used by CodeLite for code completion
set(CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS 1)

set(CONFIGURATION_NAME "Debug")

set(CL_WORKSPACE_DIRECTORY ../..)
# Set default locations
set(CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/${CL_WORKSPACE_DIRECTORY}/cmake-build-${CONFIGURATION_NAME}/output)
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})

# Projects


# Top project
# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_Socket<< Project.Name >>_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}")
set(WORKSPACE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../..")



#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
include(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../BaseCMakeLists.txt)
#}}}}

include_directories(
    .
    ..
    ${WORKSPACE_PATH}/include
    ${WORKSPACE_PATH}/interface

)


# Compiler options
add_definitions(-Wall)
add_definitions(-Wno-unknown-pragmas)
add_definitions(-Wno-reorder)
add_definitions(-Wno-switch)
add_definitions(-Wno-deprecated-declarations)
add_definitions(
    -DUSE_SEPERATE_DRIVER
)


# Linker options


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
link_directories(
    .
)

# Define the CXX sources
set ( CXX_SRCS
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../SMDSocketProcessor/<< Project.Name >>.cpp
)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -Wall -Wno-unknown-pragmas -Wno-reorder -Wno-switch -Wno-deprecated-declarations")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_library(Socket<< Project.Name >> SHARED ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(Socket<< Project.Name >> ${LINK_OPTIONS})


#{{{{ User Code 3
# Place your code here
set_target_properties(Socket<< Project.Name >> PROPERTIES PREFIX "")
set_target_properties(Socket<< Project.Name >> PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "<< Project.Name|lower >>")
#}}}}
